metadata.title: Liquid Handling
metadata.author: Mettler-Toledo International Inc. all rights reserved

transcript:
Pipettes
Discover a range of ergonomic pipettes and pipettors from Rainin. Choose from a wide assortment of single-channel, multichannel, and specialty pipettes for years of accurate results.
Pipette Tips
Made from 100% virgin polypropylene in a fully automated, Class 100,000 clean room facility, Rainin pipette tips provide excellent clarity and flexibility for accurate touch-off.
Semi-Automated Pipetting Systems
Rainin 96-channel semi-automated pipetting systems increase productivity and improve experimental repeatability across a wide range of 96-/384-well plate workflows.
Pipette Management
Take control of your pipette inventory with SmartStand, SmartCheck™, and PipetteX™ software.
Pipetting Accessories
Pipetting accessories are additions to your lab setup that help maintain the efficiency, integrity and accuracy of your liquid handling instruments.
Good Pipetting Practice
From workflow evaluation and instrument selection to technique, ergonomics, and instrument qualification, GPP helps labs improve experimental reproducibility with liquid handling training and technical and support resources.
Useful Related Links
Rainin MicroPro Semi-automated Pipette
MicroPro is the smallest semi-automated 96 channel pipette on the market.
Good Pipetting Practice
Improve your data quality with Good Pipetting Practice™ (GPP™) – METTLER TOLEDO’s comprehensive, systematic approach to maximizing pipetting accuracy and repeatability.
Biodegradable Pipette Tip Racks
Sustainable pipette tip boxes from Rainin are now available. EarthRack is made from compostable materials, bringing sustainable options to the lab.
Ergonomic Pipetting
The Rainin LTS LiteTouch System protects pipette users by making tips practically effortless to load and reduces the force required to eject the tips by up to 85%.
ShopRainin USA Pipette and Tip Product Catalog
The ShopRainin USA Pipette Tip catalog contains information on all tip products, with a greater level of detail and explanations.
Rainin Calendar
Request your 2026 Art of Pipetting calendar today! Calendars are free of charge.
Pipette Performance Matters - Trust Rainin Service to Deliver
Calibration and Preventive Maintenance for Pipettes
Professional Installation
User Training
Good Pipetting Practice
ISO 8655 Guidelines
Click Here to Order Pipette Services Tailored to Your Needs
Request Service

800 472 4646 (800 4 RAININ)

key_facts: Rainin manufactures ergonomic pipettes and pipettors for accurate liquid handling.
Rainin pipette tips are made from 100% virgin polypropylene.
Rainin pipette tips are produced in a Class 100,000 clean room facility.
Rainin offers semi-automated 96-channel pipetting systems for high-throughput workflows.
SmartStand, SmartCheck™, and PipetteX™ software support pipette inventory management.
Pipetting accessories enhance efficiency, integrity, and accuracy of liquid handling instruments.
Good Pipetting Practice (GPP) is a systematic approach to improving pipetting accuracy and repeatability.
The MicroPro semi-automated pipette is the smallest 96-channel system on the market.
EarthRack pipette tip racks are made from compostable materials for sustainable lab use.
The Rainin LTS LiteTouch System reduces tip ejection force by up to 85%.
The ShopRainin USA catalog includes detailed information on all pipette tip products.
Rainin offers a free 2026 Art of Pipetting calendar upon request.
Rainin provides calibration and preventive maintenance services for pipettes.
Professional installation and user training services are available from Rainin.
Rainin aligns with ISO 8655 guidelines for pipette performance and compliance.
Rainin instruments are available globally.
Rainin’s website uses cookies for functionality, personalization, and analytics.
Rainin is part of METTLER TOLEDO, a global provider of precision instruments.
Rainin products are manufactured in facilities adhering to strict quality standards.
Accurate pipetting is critical for reliable experimental reproducibility.
Rainin offers tailored pipette service packages via online request or phone call.
The Rainin hotline number is 800-472-4646 (800-4-RAININ).
Rainin provides technical resources and training for good pipetting practices.
Rainin’s FAQ section covers product inquiries, job applications, and usage tips.
Viscosity variations affect small-volume pipetting precision.
key_opinions: Good Pipetting Practice™ is a comprehensive solution for maximizing pipetting accuracy.
The MicroPro pipette stands out as the most compact 96-channel semi-automated system.
EarthRack represents a meaningful step toward sustainable laboratory operations.
The LTS LiteTouch System significantly improves user comfort during long pipetting sessions.
Rainin’s service offerings demonstrate strong commitment to instrument reliability.
The ShopRainin catalog provides superior detail compared to standard product listings.
The 2026 Art of Pipetting calendar adds value through educational and visual content.
Rainin’s alignment with ISO 8655 shows dedication to international standards.
User training services are essential for maintaining consistent lab results.
Rainin’s integration within METTLER TOLEDO strengthens its global credibility.
key_datapoints: Tip ejection force reduced by up to 85% using the LTS LiteTouch System.
Class 100,000 clean room facility used for pipette tip production.
MicroPro is the smallest semi-automated 96-channel pipette on the market.
Free 2026 Art of Pipetting calendar available upon request.
ISO 8655 guidelines referenced for pipette calibration and performance.
Pipette tips made from 100% virgin polypropylene.
Semi-automated systems support both 96-well and 384-well plate workflows.
Rainin offers calibration, preventive maintenance, and professional installation.
User training services are available for pipette operation and technique.
GPP helps improve experimental reproducibility through structured protocols.
Rainin operates under METTLER TOLEDO as a global precision instrument provider.
Website uses cookies for traffic analysis, ad targeting, and social media integration.
